law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Anne Arundel County Board may include capital projec...
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Anne Arundel County Board may include capital projects that are to be funded over a period of 2 fiscal years in the capital budget, whether or not part of the funding period falls in a calendar year that is an election year for county officials.
